sentence.Network_en: The Court held that the city had to afford each owner an evidentiary hearing.
sentence.Network_cn: 最高法院裁定,丹佛市须向每位所有人提供证据性听证机会.

sentence.Network_en: He filed suit, seeking a pretermination evidentiary hearing under the due process clause.
sentence.Network_cn: 肯尼迪为此起诉, 要求依正当程序条款应享有的解雇之前提供证据的听证.

sentence.Network_en: Formal adjudications under the APA are sometimes called " evidentiary hearings, " " full hearings, " or " trial - type hearings. "
sentence.Network_cn: 《行政程序法》规定的正式裁决有时被称为 " 提供证据的听证 ", " 全面听证 ",或 " 审判 式 听证 ".

formal adjudications under the APA are sometimes called " evidentiary hearings , " " full hearings , " or " trial - type hearings . "《行政程序法》规定的正式裁决有时被称为"提供证据的听证","全面听证",或"审判式听证".
